text: The Parliament of the French Community ( or PCF) is the legislative assembly of the French Community of Belgium based in the Quartier Royal. It consists of all 75 members of the Walloon Parliament except German-speaking members (currently two) who are substituted by French-speaking members from the same party, and 19 members elected by the French linguistic group of the Parliament of the Brussels-Capital Region within the former body. These members are elected for a term of five years. The current President of the Parliament of the French Community is Rudy Demotte (PS). ==Compositions== === 2019-2024 (current) === {| class="wikitable" |- ! colspan="2" rowspan="2" | Affiliation ! colspan="3" | Members |- !
